scripts.build: concurrently "pnpm sheet build" "pnpm frontend build" "pnpm backend build"
scripts.test: concurrently "pnpm sheet test" "pnpm frontend test" "pnpm backend test"
scripts.verify:fast: pnpm frontend lint && pnpm frontend test && pnpm backend test && pnpm sheet test
scripts.verify:full: pnpm frontend build && pnpm --filter @wafflebase/backend exec prisma migrate deploy && pnpm backend test:e2e && pnpm backend build && pnpm sheet build
